title: [Social Science] From March 2020 to November 2021, high trust in state health departments and mainstream news outlets, old age and higher income, were positively associated with COVID vaccination, while high trust in the Whitehouse and belief that China purposely spread the virus reduced the odds of vaccination

[Genetics] Scientists have demonstrated in animal models the possibility of using lipid nanoparticles and messenger RNA, the technology underpinning COVID-19 vaccines, to treat blindness associated with a rare genetic condition
